name: vocard
description: Vocard is a self-hosted digital business card and contact sharing platform. It lets users create and share profile pages with links and contact info via QR codes or short URLs.
features: Digital business cards: Create professional digital business cards with contact information and links.
QR code sharing: Generate QR codes for easy sharing of contact information in person.
Short URLs: Create memorable short URLs for sharing your digital card online.
Custom profiles: Customize your profile with photos, bio, and social media links.
Contact export: Allow recipients to export contact information to their address book.
Analytics: Track views and interactions with your digital business card.
Multiple cards: Create different cards for different contexts or roles.
Mobile-optimized: Display cards beautifully on mobile devices for on-the-go sharing.
No app required: Recipients view cards in their browser without installing apps.
Privacy-focused: Host your own contact sharing platform without third-party services.
Customizable design: Personalize card appearance with colors and styling options.
Link management: Add and organize links to your website, portfolio, and social profiles.
